posts.post_content:
This auction is for an 1881 Boston Base Ball Association $100 Stock Certificate issued in 1881. The form originates from the 1870s with a crossed out 7 to make the date 1881. It is also embossed or notarized with an 1871 date. Very nice condition grading at least EXCELLENT.

First $500 offer takes it.

[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/247CARDS/1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/247CARDS/2.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/247CARDS/3.jpg[/IMG]
